execution_plan.description: Compute the average order value (total_eur) and order count for the EU region by aggregating the orders in the sales_eu database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EU' AS region, AVG(total_eur) AS avg_order_value, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders;

execution_plan.description: Compute the average order value (total_eur) and order count for the US region by aggregating the orders in the sales_us database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'US' AS region, AVG(total_eur) AS avg_order_value, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders;
